metadata.name: Enlighten
metadata.description:
The spiritual meaning of enlightenment is a state of heightened consciousness. It can be seen as awakening one's true nature and a deep understanding of life. It happens when one's consciousness transcends beyond the physical realm to connect with a higher power or source.


This steel-wool image depicts enlightenment. It is important to ignite the fire within to attain a higher level of consciousness. Higher the level, the brighter the light and enlightenment.

Artist: Brijesh Makadia  
Subject: Steel Wool  
Location: Rajkot  
Year: May 2022  
Dimensions: 4000 X 2817  
Edition: 1/1  
Camera: Canon R6

THE LICENSE  
Extended Editorial. Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works.
